headline: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) Elevates Leaders In Federal Affairs And Policy
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) recently announced executive changes, promoting Pepper Natonski to Senior Vice President of Federal Affairs, Policy and Sustainability, and Tom Craig to Vice President of Federal Affairs, both effective from July 1, 2025. These leadership shifts support the company's engagement in federal policy and sustainability efforts. Despite these internal developments, Duke Energy's stock price experienced a 1.5% decline over the past week. Meanwhile, the broader market remained...

headline: Is NEE Building Sustainable Growth Through Capital Spending?
summary: NextEra Energy is investing more than $72 billion through 2029 to expand clean energy, boost grid resilience and drive steady earnings growth.

raw.headline: Is NEE Building Sustainable Growth Through Capital Spending?

headline: Duke Energy crews restore power to more than 41,000 after severe storms in Ohio/Kentucky
summary: Duke Energy has restored power to more than 41,000 customers who were affected by severe and damaging storms that ripped through southwest Ohio and northern Kentucky last night, causing more than 48,000 power outages across the region. Crews are working to restore approximately 7,000 customers who remained without power as of 10:15 a.m. ET.

headline: Duke Energy crews restore power to more than 73,000 after severe storms in Indiana
summary: Duke Energy has restored power to more than 73,000 customers who were affected by severe and damaging storms that ripped through Indiana yesterday, causing more than 100,000 power outages across nearly all of the 28 districts the company serves. Crews are working to restore approximately 31,000 customers who remained without power as of 6 a.m. ET.
